snippet.title: Afrofuturistic Metaverse Dah Varsity Product Demo August 15 2022
snippet.description: Gameplay showing several features of the Afrofuturistic Metaverse Dah-Varsity. You see how students learn by doing missions in several open world environments. The game uses superhero rap to inspire students to be the superhero version of themselves. You see product integration, e-commerce, features like a point of interest interactive map and the ability to tour virtual environments and be trained. The character can also breakdance while touring virtual environments adding cultural relevance to training and learning Afrofuturistic Metaverse. This is an experience like no other all from a mobile device. Students Learn today and Earn Tomorrow. The Dah-Varsity app is on iOS and Android.
